subject.normal: Windows Binaries was RE: SQLTablesPrivileges, SQLGetInfo and OpenOffice

body.para: Is there a way I can get the binaries for these changes for Windows? I am in the process of setting up a database in XP with MySQL and StarOffice and ran across the same problem. Currently I do not have a windows compiler to compile this myself
